quotes.quote: The Bible will always be full of things you cannot understand, as long as you will not live according to those you can understand.
All other Books are of little importance in comparison with the Holy Scriptures
Reading the Bible will help you get to know the word, but it's when you put it down and live your life that you get to know the author.
The Word of God is a Person. When you read it, do you see words or do you see Him?
The Bible was written in tears, and to tears it yields its best treasures.
It is not at all incredible, that a book which has been so long in the possession of mankind should contain many truths as yet undiscovered.
The Christian's Bible is a drug store. Its contents remain the same, but the medical practice changes.
A thorough knowledge of the Bible is worth more than a college education.
The Bible is the greatest example of the whole being greater that its parts.
In all my perplexities and distresses, the Bible has never failed to give me light and strength.
Alcohol may be man's worst enemy, but the bible says love your enemy.
It is impossible to enslave mentally or socially a Bible-reading people. The principles of the Bible are the groundwork of human freedom.
What we really need, after all, is not to defend the Bible but to understand it.
Where one man reads the Bible, a hundred read you and me.
The word of God hidden in the heart is a stubborn voice to suppress.
The highest earthly enjoyments are but a shadow of the joy I find in reading God's word
If you believe what you like in the Gospel, and reject what you don't like, it is not the Gospel you believe, but yourself.
The Bible is meant to be down-to-earth. It was written for real people facing real issues.
The whole hope of human progress is suspended on the ever growing influence of the Bible.
The Bible is...as necessary to spiritual life as breath is to natural life. There is nothing more essential to our lives than the Word of God.
The secret of my success? It is simple. It is found in the Bible.
Both read the Bible day and night, but thou read black where I read white.
Within the covers of the Bible are the answers for all the problems men face.
I know the Bible is inspired because it inspires me.
I believe the Bible is the best gift God has ever given to man. All the good from The Savior of the world is communicated to us through this Book.
The Bible is the greatest of all books; to study it is the noblest of all pursuits; to understand it, the highest of all goals.
The Bible is the cornerstone of liberty...students' perusal of the sacred volume will make us better citizens, better fathers, and better husbands.
England has two books; the Bible and Shakespeare. England made Shakespeare, but the Bible made England.
Fresh light shall yet break out from God's word
The Bible is a revelation of the mind and will of God to men. Therein we may learn, what God is.
No one ever graduates from BIBLE study until he meets the Author face to face
The inspiration of the Bible depends upon the ignorance of the gentleman who reads it.
It is impossible to rightly govern the world without God and the Bible.
The Bible has noble poetry in it... and some good morals and a wealth of obscenity, and upwards of a thousand lies.
I believe that the existence of the Bible is the greatest benefit to the human race. Any attempt to belittle it, I believe, is a crime against humanity.
The word morality, if we met it in the Bible, would surprise us as much as the word telephone or motor car.
The Bible is the book of my life. It's the book I live with, the book I live by, the book I want to die by.
We do not read the Bible the way it is; we read it the way we are.
The Bible is no mere book, but a Living Creature, with a power that conquers all that oppose it.
The Bible is still loved by millions, read by millions, and studied by millions.
The Bible may be the truth, but it is not the whole truth and nothing but the truth.
If you look at the Bible as a whole, it's redemptive and beautiful, and it's God's love story to mankind.
The Bible is only as good and decent as the person reading it.
Down through the years, I turned to the Bible and found in it all that I needed
I am busily engaged in the study of the Bible. I believe it is God's word because it finds me where I am.
Bible reading is an education in itself.
The Bible tells me that every life is holy; the Bible tells me that every life is loved; the Bible tells me that every life is called to be all that it can be.

There are more sure marks of authenticity in the Bible than in any profane history. I have a fundamental belief in the Bible as the Word of God, written by men who were inspired. I study the Bible daily.
The bible when taken metaphorically, provides us the truth about god; but when taken literally, the bible provides as the truth about man.
